Package controller

Class MainScreenController

java.lang.Object
controller.MainScreenController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class MainScreenController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This is the controller for the main screen.

    • fieldError

      public static void fieldError​(javafx.scene.control.TextField field)
      This method is used in the error messages to change the style of a textfield to indicate that there is an issue with it.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(java.net.URL location, java.util.ResourceBundle resources)
      This is the initialize method. It sets up the parts and products table to be able to display the necessary data.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • addPartB

      public void addPartB​(javafx.scene.input.MouseEvent mouseEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      This method sends you to the add part screen when the add button on the parts table is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getmodifyPart

      public static model.Part getmodifyPart()

    • modifyPartB

      public void modifyPartB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      This method sends you to the modify part screen when the modify button on the parts table is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • searchParts

      public void searchParts()
      This method searches all the parts to find a match to search input. It then sets the matches it found to be displayed in the tableview.

    • deletePartB

      public void deletePartB()
      This method removes a part from the parts table. It also provides error messages if there was no selected part and if the selected part is associated with a product. And lastly it confirms the deletion of the part.

    • addProductB

      public void addProductB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      This method sends you to the add product screen when the add button on the products table is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • getmodifyProduct

      public static Product getmodifyProduct()

    • modifyProductB

      public void modifyProductB​(javafx.event.ActionEvent actionEvent) throws java.io.IOException
      This method sends you to the modify product screen when the modify button on the products table is clicked.
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException

    • searchProducts

      public void searchProducts()
      This method searches all the products to find a match to search input. It then sets the matches it found to be displayed in the tableview.

    • deleteProductB

      public void deleteProductB()
      This method removes a product from the products table. It also provides error messages if there was no selected product and if the selected product has associated parts. And lastly it confirms the deletion of the product.

    • exitProgramButton

      public void exitProgramButton()
      This method exits the program when the exit button is clicked
